definition: هبل habila a (habal) to be bereaved of her son (mother) V to take a vapor bath VIII to avail o.s., take advantage (هـ of an opportunity); to intrigue. scheme │ اهتبل هبلك ihtabil habalaka watch out for your own interests! take care of your own affairs! mind your own business! هبل hiball a tall, husky man
